subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Grasshoppers, Switzerland’s most successful club, ended their longest wait for a trophy when they beat Basel on penalty kicks after a 1-1 draw in the Swiss Cup final in Bern.
snippet: Grasshoppers, Switzerland’s most successful club, ended their longest wait for a trophy when they beat Basel on penalty kicks after a 1-1 draw in the Swiss Cup final in Bern.
